name: Rainbow World (AngryOwl72)
description:
Welcome to Rainbow World! The land where all color comes from. You play as Prysm, the prismatic protector of this radiant realm on a quest to stop your evil Shadow from stealing the color from everything!

Art and code made by AngryOwl72 (that's me)

Music made by BloodPixelHero on freesound. Link: Freesound - BloodPixelHero

Made for the Mini Jam 111: Colors² on itch.io

Warning: This game is optimized for the 1920x1080 resolution. If you don't use this resolution, the game won't be impossible, but it just might look a bit weird.

Link to Gamejolt page: Rainbow World by Angryowl72 - Game Jolt
